name: SCNBufferFrequency
desc: Options for how often SceneKit should execute the binding handler you provide with the handleBinding(ofBufferNamed:frequency:handler:) method.

items.name: case perFrame
items.desc: Execute the binding handler once for each frame to be rendered using the shader.

items.name: case perNode
items.desc: Execute the binding handler once for each frame, for each node to be rendered using the shader.

items.name: case perShadable
items.desc: Execute the binding handler once for each frame, for each node, for each material or geometry to be rendered using the shader.
